name: Crime Chaser
description:
Crime Chaser is a small endless car chasing game made with JavaScript. The game is set on a highway where you are chasing someone who stole a sports car.

Crime Chaser features a local highscore and a points shop (no micro-transactions) with multiple car skins to choose from and extra lifes.

Controls: WASD or the arrow keys to move, S to open the shop in the main menu, Space to start the game when you are in the shop.

Note: You always have to select a car in the shop in order to start the game. Highscore and points are saved via localstorage in your browser.

Crime Chaser is a game made by Jan "GamesTrap" Schürkamp and Tim Hucker.
